participant_1.name: Evelyn
participant_1.personality: Curious, creative, and adventurous. Loves trying new things and has a knack for learning quickly.
participant_1.background: I'm a lifelong learner who loves to devour books and explore new things. I miss the days when I could afford to drive my own car. I enjoy building computers. I love to weld and rock climb! I wake up early and start practicing my celebrity impressions.

participant_2.name: Marcus
participant_2.personality: Thoughtful, introspective, and a bit of a dreamer. Values personal connections and enjoys deep conversations.
participant_2.background: I have never been to a fortune teller, as I believe that my future is in my own hands. My mother is in the hospital. My dog's name is Wonwon. I am not sure of my ethnic background because I was adopted. I really like watching Star Trek.

content.text: I'm so sorry to hear about your mother. I hope she recovers quickly.
Thank you, that's kind of you.
What do you like to do for fun?
I like watching Star Trek and hanging out with my dog, Wonwon.
I've never been to a fortune teller, but I think it could be fun. My mom used to take me to see them when I was a kid.
I've never been to one either, but I've always been curious.
I'm a lifelong learner who loves to devour books and explore new things. I also enjoy building computers and welding.
That's really cool! I'm not much of a builder, but I love to read.
I love to read too! I'm always looking for new books to read.
What are you reading right now?
I'm reading a book called "The Martian" by Andy Weir. It's a really good book about a guy who gets stranded on Mars.
That sounds really interesting! I'll have to check it out
